description: This Java source file defines the ZilkerClientFactory class, which provides a factory method to obtain an instance of NativeZilkerClient, taking into account platform-specific conditions and availability of native binaries.

classes.name: ZilkerClientFactory
classes.description: Factory class for creating instances of NativeZilkerClient based on platform and availability.

methods.name: getNativeZilkerClient
methods.description: Returns an instance of NativeZilkerClient, either native or fallback, depending on platform detection and binary availability.
